about_the_game:
The Hero Factory, where you can choose the right pattern and colour for your Bulanci. You can highlight the nature of your killer pillow with sunglasses, an eyepatch, a baseball cap, or leather gloves, to name but a few.

The package contains

27 different accessories
8 types of bedding in 45 color variants
7 different voices

Ability to open new add-ons for achievements

The package will continue to be expanded for free!
detailed_description:
The Hero Factory, where you can choose the right pattern and colour for your Bulanci. You can highlight the nature of your killer pillow with sunglasses, an eyepatch, a baseball cap, or leather gloves, to name but a few.

The package contains

27 different accessories
8 types of bedding in 45 color variants
7 different voices

Ability to open new add-ons for achievements

The package will continue to be expanded for free!

name: Bulanci: Hero Factory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1 or newer), Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Celeron N4100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1 or newer), Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-650 / AMD A10-5800K or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7510 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: The Hero Factory, where you can choose the right pattern and colour for your Bulanci. You can highlight the nature of your killer pillow with sunglasses, an eyepatch, a baseball cap, or leather gloves, to name but a few.
supported_languages:
English*, Czech*, Polish*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Hungarian*, French*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Ukrainian*, Slovak*
*languages with full audio support
